version_description:
- Support for 3D Touch and Live Photos
- Optimizations for iPad Pro
- Improved date inspection to stamp each photo's Date Taken if available, otherwise the Creation Date is used
- Other minor improvements to the stamping process and interface updates

3D Touch
- Quick Actions are now available right on your home screen to instantly jump to view all photos or just your favorites
- Press lightly to peek at a photo, swipe up to see actions, or press deeper to pop into the full screen photo

Live Photos
- Quickly see which photos are Live Photos
- Easily view and share Live Photos
- Apply a stamp to the still representation of a Live Photo, and revert at any time

If you love DateStamper, or you just consider it to be useful, please leave a rating or review in the App Store! They are greatly appreciated.
Stability improvements and other enhancements, including the ability to share a Live Photo as a Still Photo

You can now change the date stamped on your photo directly in the app! This will modify the photo's Date Taken metadata, while still allowing you to revert to the original date at any time.

Customize your date stamps with more style options! Select a custom color, new font, add a stroke or shadow, adjust the placement of the date stamp, or even use a custom date format. Unlock Premium Styles to access the new customization options.

Other updates include:
- Improved Split View Multitasking support for iPad
- Minor layout improvements and bug fixes

Please consider writing a review to let others know why you use DateStamper! Or update an existing review. Each one is greatly appreciated as it helps others to discover DateStamper.

This update improves the detection of Date Taken values embedded in each photo.

New in version 2.2:
- You can now change the date stamped on your photo directly in the app! This will modify the photo's Date Taken metadata, while still allowing you to revert to the original date at any time.
- Customize your date stamps with more style options! Select a custom color, new font, add a stroke or shadow, adjust the placement of the date stamp, or even use a custom date format. Unlock Premium Styles to access the new customization options.

Please consider writing a review to let others know why you use DateStamper! Or update an existing review. Each one is greatly appreciated as it helps others to discover DateStamper.

DateStamper is now optimized for iOS 10! New features include:

◉ You can now apply date stamps to Live Photos and preserve the Live portion. The stamp will apply only to the still photo, deferring to the video when played. (Requires iOS 10)
◉ A new Vibrant Dark style is available, beautifully blending a dark date stamp into the photo.
◉ 3 stunning fonts have been added, Lobster, Magnolia Script, and Gel Pen Upright.
◉ Get to your photos even quicker. Now DateStamper will take you right into the last album you viewed. Quickly switch albums without leaving the selection screen.
◉ Rearrange favorite colors. Just drag and drop to the desired position.
◉ Change settings quicker with the updated Photos extension.

This update also contains performance improvements, interface updates, and minor bug fixes.

If you love stamping your photos, please leave a review on the App Store! Reviews are much appreciated.
This update includes stability enhancements and bug fixes, including a fix for an issue where the date stamped may not be correct if the photo was taken in a different time zone.

Hello 2017. And hello DateStamper 3.1.

This update allows you to stamp photos right after you take them! Just tap the camera icon in the app. Because the stamp is applied after the photo is taken, you can revert to the original photo at any time to remove the stamp. This update also includes the ability to delete photos from your library.

If you were hoping to see a camera addition, please consider leaving a review on the App Store. Or if you already have, please update your existing review. Thank you!

This update includes various improvements and bug fixes to enhance the date stamping experience. Notable changes include:
- Increased performance of date stamping process
- Updated camera to stamp photos without requiring modify confirmation
- Resolved a crash that may occur after taking a photo
- Fixed an issue where photo thumbnails may not update after applying or removing a date stamp

DateStamper 4.0 introduces a beautifully refreshed design, additional style options, drag and drop, full accessibility support, and more.

+ Refreshed Design
- DateStamper has been redesigned and refined for a fresh new look
- The new tab bar allows you to browse your photos, take new photos, and change style options quickly and easily
- Photo selection options are now organized and grouped together
- The Stamp button automatically appears when photos are selected

+ Additional Styles
- Add a background color underneath the date stamp
- Center the date stamp on your photos with new position options
- Make the date stamp larger with the new Extra Extra Large size
- Specify the exact date and time format you’d like using the new fixed date format option

+ Drag and Drop
- Drag and drop photos in your albums to rearrange them
- Drag photos from DateStamper and drop them into other apps
- Drag photos from other apps into DateStamper to add them to your library
- Drag favorite colors from DateStamper and drop them into other apps
- Drag colors from other apps into your favorite colors in DateStamper

+ Accessibility Support
- DateStamper is now fully accessible while using assistive technologies including VoiceOver and Switch Control
- Added support for Dynamic Type
- Added support for Smart Invert
- Improved support for Reduce Motion
- Improved support for Reduce Transparency

+ And More
- Ability to swipe between full-screen photos
- In-app Settings screen
- Wide color support
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Optimizations for iOS 11

Let me know if you love this update! Your reviews are greatly appreciated.
DateStamper now looks absolutely stunning on iPhone X with full support for the Super Retina display. This update also includes a few enhancements and bug fixes.

This update adds the ability to revert a photo right from the 3D Touch quick actions, addresses an issue where the Photos plugin may not appear properly, and includes full support for the stunning Super Retina display on iPhone X.

To better support continued development of DateStamper, Unlimited Batch now allows you to stamp more than 10 photos at once. For a limited time, Unlimited Batch is 50% off to say thank you for your continued support!
This update includes minor user interface and user experience enhancements.
This update adds the ability to change the opacity of the date stamp, resolves an issue where time may be unintentionally included with the fixed date format, and includes other minor improvements.

● Updated the date format to match your preferences from Settings, such as 24-Hour Time
● Corrected the location of included time to come before the date if appropriate for your language
● System-localized text will now appear where available

DateStamper is now optimized for iOS 12! This update also includes:

○ A redesigned interface for selecting your albums
○ A beautiful new font titled Viksi Script
○ A new 3D Touch quick action to take a new photo
○ Siri Shortcuts to take a new photo, or view your recent and favorite photos*
○ Handoff support
○ Improved VoiceOver support
○ Various interface enhancements
○ Performance enhancements

* You can ask Siri to do these tasks for you. First perform the action in the app, find it in the Settings app under Siri & Search, then add your custom phrase and ask away.

DateStamper is now optimized for iOS 12 and the brand new iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max! This update also includes:

○ A redesigned interface for selecting your albums
○ A beautiful new font titled Viksi Script
○ A new 3D Touch quick action to take a new photo
○ Siri Shortcuts to take a new photo, or view your recent and favorite photos*
○ Handoff support
○ Improved VoiceOver support
○ Various interface enhancements
○ Performance enhancements

* You can ask Siri to do these tasks for you. First perform the action in the app, find it in the Settings app under Siri & Search, then add your custom phrase and ask away.
Date stamps are now created in your most-preferred language. You can change your preferences in the Settings app under General > Language & Region.
Date stamps are now created in your most-preferred language. You can change your preferences in the Settings app under General > Language & Region.
This update adds support for the new iPad Pro models and includes stability improvements.

● Give your date stamp a raised metallic appearance with the new Emboss style
● Letterpress has been removed but can be simulated with stroke and shadow options
● Improved stroke and shadow drawing especially at larger sizes
● Added an option to make the text transparent when stroke is enabled
● And various other improvements

▹ Added an option to remove padding
▹ Minor improvements to photos layout on iPad

► Addresses an issue where reverting the photo to its original version could fail
► Adds helpful information when changing the date for a photo

Caption
■ You can now add custom text to your stamp with a caption
■ Place your text above or below the date stamp, or keep it on the same line

New Fonts
■ Big Snow – a hand lettering modern calligraphy typeface
■ Ballystic – a smooth handwriting typeface
■ Gilligan Shutter – a monoline script typeface
■ Herdrock – a modern brush typeface
■ Stencilia-A has been replaced with Cleanwork
This update adds an option to replace the date with a caption. If you didn't see the previous version's release notes, yes, you can now add a caption!
This update adds an option to replace the date with a caption. If you didn't see the previous version's release notes, yes, you can now add a caption!

▸ Resolves an issue where the date style could appear in an unexpected format
▸ Reduces the app size for iOS 12.2 and later
This update improves stability and includes other minor bug fixes.

DateStamper is now optimized for iOS 13 and offers more customizations for stamping your photos.

■ Ability to use the date taken, date created, current date, or a custom date
■ Ability to select a system font or any font downloaded from the App Store*
■ Context menus for photo thumbnails*
■ Support for new multiselect gesture*
■ Accessibility improvements
■ Beautifully refreshed app icon
■ Refined dark interface and iconography*

*Requires iOS 13

DateStamper is now optimized for iOS 13 and offers more customizations for stamping your photos.

■ Ability to use the date taken, date created, current date, or a custom date
■ Ability to select a system font or any font downloaded from the App Store*
■ Context menus for photo thumbnails*
■ Support for new multiselect gesture*
■ Accessibility improvements
■ Beautifully refreshed app icon
■ Refined dark interface and iconography*

*Requires iOS 13

● Updated the date format to match your preferences from Settings, such as 24-Hour Time
● Corrected the location of included time to come before the date if appropriate for your language
● System-localized text will now appear where available
This update adds the ability to take a photo right when you open the app — enable this option in Settings. Minor bug fixes and enhancements are also included in this update.
This update includes minor enhancements including support for mouse and trackpad pointer interactions.
This update includes minor enhancements and bug fixes.
This update includes stability improvements.

DateStamper 7.0 introduces location stamps, a new custom colors interface, optimization for iOS 14, and more.

□ Stamp location: stamp the location where your photos were taken — choose between name, address, coordinates, or custom text
□ Change location: add, adjust, or remove a photo’s location
□ Tag location: save location metadata when taking photos in the app
□ Text and Order: easily customize the date stamp text options and the order they appear
□ Improved batch stamp process: no longer stops preparing when an error occurs
□ Redesigned album picker: browse your albums and folders quicker
□ All-new custom colors interface*: select colors using the system color picker — includes support for colors with opacity
□ Support for new calendar date picker*
□ Support for limited access to selected photos*
□ Other minor improvements and bug fixes

*Requires iOS 14

This update includes minor enhancements and bug fixes.

DateStamper 7.0 introduces location stamps, a new custom colors interface, optimization for iOS 14, and more.

□ Stamp location: stamp the location where your photos were taken — choose between name, address, coordinates, or custom text
□ Change location: add, adjust, or remove a photo’s location
□ Tag location: save location metadata when taking photos in the app
□ Text and Order: easily customize the date stamp text options and the order they appear
□ Improved batch stamp process: no longer stops preparing when an error occurs
□ Redesigned album picker: browse your albums and folders quicker
□ All-new custom colors interface*: select colors using the system color picker — includes support for colors with opacity
□ Support for new calendar date picker*
□ Support for limited access to selected photos*
□ Other minor improvements and bug fixes

*Requires iOS 14

▻ Added an option to change the Photos access settings when only limited access is granted
▻ Optimizations for iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12 Pro, and iPhone 12 Pro Max
▻ Other minor enhancements
This update includes stability improvements.
